Node.Text: Well, if it isn't my favorite commoner.
Why do you address me as commoner?
Well, silly, I'm the top of the food chain, while you're stuck at the bottom.
Such thin skin! You should really man up.
Good. It looks like you know your place.
Did you hear about the apartment owner?
Of course. It's so sad, isn't it?
Of course, who hasn't heard at this point?
I live here. Of course I have.
It's sad that the owner thought that was the only way out. What was he thinking?
Well, darling, that man always had a weak will.
That's very rude to speak poorly of the dead. One should give him some dignity.
Oh, dear, you are too kind and weak for this world! Now, if you'll excuse me, this is my floor.
I didn't know he was such a weak and pathetic man.
You are right, he was a pathetic man indeed. There is no other way to describe him. Now, I must be going.
I thought you said that you don't like rumors? Regardless, it seems we're at my floor, so I will take my leave.
